name: Blueprint Technologies
overview:
BluePrint Technologies is a dynamic, progressive business communications company providing the most reliable and feature-rich telecommunication technologies and business telecom products, services, and applications available to companies today.

BluePrint Technologies is a dynamic business communications company providing the most reliable and feature-rich telecommunication technologies and business telecom products, services including VOIP for Business, Unified Communications, Data Networking, Voice Mail, Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Surveillance, and all manners of Unified Technologies.

Proudly serving California, Kentucky, Indiana, Texas, New York, and the Tri-State Metro NY Area. BluePrint Technologies Inc. and our subsidiaries serves thousands of companies throughout the country with offices in Austin, New York, Los Angeles, Sacramento, San Diego, Louisville, Lexington, Indianapolis, Midtown Manhattan, and Perth Amboy, NJ.
